availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Benton, Kentucky, merchant. Orange County, Virginia, native. Son of John Strow and Catherine Walters Strow. Married Catherine Burd Strow. Father of W. W. Strow, J. H. Strow, S. F. Strow, E. J. Strow, Thomas Jefferson Strow, S. A. Strow, Lucinda Strow, Caroline C. Strow, and James W. Strow. Married Mary Carter Sledd Strow. Father of Rosa M. Strow. Merchant in Benton in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 430 B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Benton, p. 1; History and Families, McCracken County, Kentucky, 1824-1989 (Paducah, Ky.: Turner Publishing Co., 1989), 248.
